article_title: Support from religious voters bodes well for Trump
article_text:
Gloucester, MA (01930)

Today

Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 73F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 64F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

article_metadata.author: Kery Murakami Washington Reporter

og.description: GREENVILLE, S.C. — Outside the Mutts BBQ restaurant in Easley, South Carolina, last week, John Aistrop worried about the prospect of Donald Trump becoming president.
